snippet: Companies may need to hire if they see even modest gains in productivity and more demand for their products.
abstract: Labor Department says productivity increased at a 1.6 percent annual rate in the second quarter, compared with a 0.5 percent decline in the first quarter.
lead_paragraph: Companies may need to hire if they see even modest gains in productivity and more demand for their products.

headline.seo: Productivity Rose a Slight 1.6% in Second Quarter
